name: Today I Went on a Quest
name_original: Today I Went on a Quest
description:
A curse has fallen on Magi Burger! Three employees decide to head into the store on a day they're not scheduled to save their coworkers from the evil that has struck them.

This is the first full game I've ever produced. It's a short experience, somewhere between 10-20 minutes, and is built in RPG Maker 2003. I'd love feedback about the gameplay, writing, and art direction, or really anything you may have to say, and I have many projects lined up for the future.

- Viktor the Great
